item.title: 风力发电量骤降，德国电价飙升
item.description: 德国电力价格跳涨，原因是预计风力发电量将下滑，迫使人们转而使用更昂贵的化石燃料。【原文：German power prices jumped, as a forecast slump in wind generation forces a switch to more expensive fossil fuels.】

item.title: 克罗地亚杂货连锁店 Studenac 因 "形势严峻 "取消首次公开募股
item.description: 克罗地亚杂货连锁店 Studenac Group SA 及其所有者以资本市场条件 "严峻 "为由，撤回了出售华沙和萨格勒布股票的计划。【原文：Croatian grocery chain Studenac Group SA and its owner withdrew plans to sell shares in Warsaw and Zagreb, citing “challenging” conditions on capital markets.】

item.title: Grifols 首席执行官表示正在商谈债务再融资和信贷额度事宜
item.description: 陷入困境的西班牙制药商Grifols SA正在与银行谈判，为明年到期的债券再融资，并延长循环信贷额度，合计约14亿欧元（14.8亿美元），以平息投资者对其偿债能力的担忧。【原文：The embattled Spanish drugmaker Grifols SA is in talks with banks to refinance bonds due next year and extend a revolving credit line — together about €1.4 billion ($1.48 billion) — as it seeks to quell investor concerns about its ability to meet obligations.】

item.title: 投票失败后，梅洛尼试图缓和联盟紧张局势
item.description: 乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）在一个小伙伴站在反对党一边否决了政府的一项提案后，正竭力防止意大利联盟的紧张局势公开化。【原文：Giorgia Meloni is scrambling to prevent Italian coalition tensions from breaking into the open after a junior partner sided with the opposition to defeat a government proposal.】

item.title: 欧洲汽油出口将从科维德事件后的低点反弹
item.description: 欧洲汽油市场因出口需求低迷而举步维艰，但随着 11 月份出口流量从多年来的低点反弹，欧洲汽油市场正在得到提振。【原文：Europe’s gasoline market, which has struggled with lackluster export demand, is getting a boost as outbound flows in November rebound from a multi-year low.】

item.title: 伊斯坦布尔大巴扎的外汇交易受到假币恐慌的冲击
item.description: 对 50 美元和 100 美元假钞的恐惧扰乱了伊斯坦布尔大巴扎的外汇交易。【原文：Fears of counterfeit $50 and $100 bills have disrupted foreign-exchange trade at Istanbul’s Grand Bazaar.】

item.title: 爱尔兰大选事关重大？
item.description: 爱尔兰将于周五举行大选，总理西蒙-哈里斯（Simon Harris）希望利用强劲的经济优势，再执政五年。【原文：Ireland holds a general election on Friday, with Prime Minister Simon Harris hoping to capitalize on a strong economy to secure another five years in power.】

item.title: 据说阿里巴巴支持的 Trendyol 考虑融资 10 亿美元
item.description: 熟悉情况的人士称，土耳其电子商务公司 Trendyol 正在考虑融资约 10 亿美元，以帮助公司发展。【原文：Turkish e-commerce company Trendyol is considering raising about $1 billion to help its growth, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 为 "临时工 "设计的新型电动滑板车为 Ola 增值 10 亿美元
item.description: Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. 为从事快速送货的工人推出新型电动滑板车后，该公司的市值在短短两天内飙升了 10 亿美元。【原文：Ola Electric Mobility Ltd.’s market cap surged by $1 billion in just two days after the company launched a new electric scooter for workers involved in quicker deliveries.】

item.title: 莫桑比克南非边境骚乱持续第二天
item.description: 莫桑比克高速公路特许公司称，由于政治动乱，莫桑比克与南非的主要过境点于周四被封锁了第二天。【原文：Mozambique’s main border crossing with South Africa was blocked for a second day on Thursday due to political unrest, the highway concessionaire said.】

item.title: 芬兰苏姆玛公司将建立无人机制造厂援助乌克兰
item.description: 芬兰的 Summa Defence Oy 公司将开始在北欧国家生产无人机，以支持乌克兰抗击俄罗斯的斗争。【原文：Finland’s Summa Defence Oy will start producing drones in the Nordic country in an effort to support Ukraine’s fight against Russia.】

item.title: 瑞士交易所首席执行官出人意料地离职，西伯恩接过帅印
item.description: 瑞士证券交易所首席执行官约斯-迪塞尔霍夫（Jos Dijsselhof）在任职七年后即将卸任。【原文：The Chief Executive Officer of the Swiss stock exchange, Jos Dijsselhof, is stepping down after seven years in charge.】

item.title: 翁施告诉《日经新闻》，欧洲央行可能会逐步降息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员皮埃尔-温施（Pierre Wunsch）在接受《日经新闻》采访时表示，随着通胀缓解，欧洲央行可能会继续降息，并最终将利率降至 "接近2%的水平"。【原文：The European Central Bank may be able to keep cutting interest rates as inflation eases and could ultimately lower them to “somewhere close to 2%,” Governing Council member Pierre Wunsch told Nikkei in an interview.】

item.title: 德国最高法院驳回对能源暴利税的质疑
item.description: 德国最高法院驳回了一项针对征收可再生能源生产商在俄罗斯全面入侵乌克兰后获得的部分巨额利润的诉讼。【原文：Germany’s top court rejected a suit targeting a levy that harvested part of the huge profits renewable-energy producers made after Russia’s full-scale invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: Oaktree 采购主管如何寻找下一笔大交易
item.description:
什么时候说 "是 "最合适

？【原文：

When is the right time to say yes

】

item.title: Oaktree 采购主管如何寻找下一笔大交易
item.description: 说到信贷投资（或任何投资），决定证券的正确价格是一门分析艺术。但这往往只是挑战的一部分。首先，你需要有人愿意把证券卖给你。对于公开市场的股票而言，这通常并不难。流动性很强，"要价 "众所周知。而在私人信贷领域，这就棘手得多。必须有人向你推销这笔交易。必须有人打电话给你，告诉你有关情况。那么【原文：When it comes to credit investing (or really any investing), there’s an analytic art in deciding the right price to pay for a security. But often that’s only part of the challenge. First you need someone to want to sell it to you. In something like public-market equity, this usually isn’t hard. Liquidity is deep, and the “ask” price is well known. In something like private credit, it’s much trickier. Someone has to sell you the deal. Someone has to call you about it and tell you about it. So how】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行布洛克称通胀 "过高 "不宜考虑降息
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行行长米歇尔-布洛克（Michele Bullock）表示，澳大利亚的核心通胀率 "过高"，短期内无法考虑降息。【原文：Australia’s core inflation is “too high” to consider interest-rate cuts in the near term, Reserve Bank Governor Michele Bullock said, reiterating that there’s still some way to go before prices return sustainably to target.】

item.title: 赞比亚通胀飙升，电费上涨 115
item.description: 由于赞比亚遭受了一个多世纪以来最严重的旱灾，加上克瓦查币持续疲软，电价和食品价格飙升，赞比亚11月份的年通货膨胀率跃升至三年来的最高水平。【原文：Zambia’s annual inflation rate jumped to its highest level in three years in November as the nation’s worst drought in more than a century and the kwacha’s continued weakness stoked electricity and food prices.】

item.title: 据说瑞典纳尔卡公司将为医疗保健部门的首次公开募股挑选银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，瑞典投资公司 Nalka Invest AB 已选定银行帮助安排其控股医疗部门 Asker Healthcare Group AB 的潜在上市事宜。【原文：Swedish investment firm Nalka Invest AB has picked banks to help arrange a potential listing of its majority-owned medical unit Asker Healthcare Group AB, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法国政府酝酿让步以避免预算灾难
item.description: 法国财政部长安托万-阿尔芒（Antoine Armand）表示，他准备在 2025 年预算法案上做出让步，以避免反对党在未来几周内推翻政府。【原文：French Finance Minister Antoine Armand said he is prepared to make concessions on the 2025 budget bill to avoid opposition parties toppling the government in the coming weeks.】

item.title: 受基数效应影响，西班牙通胀率跃升至 8 月以来最高点
item.description: 西班牙通胀率上升至 8 月份以来的最快速度，尽管这一加速是由基数效应推动的，但不太可能破坏欧洲中央银行继续降低利率的计划。【原文：Spanish inflation quickened to the fastest pace since August, though the acceleration was driven by base effects and is unlikely to scupper plans for the European Central Bank to continue lowering interest rates.】

item.title: 法国 10 年期借贷成本首次与希腊持平
item.description: 法国的基准债券收益率有史以来首次与希腊的基准债券收益率持平，使这个集团的第二大经济体与曾经处于欧洲主权债务危机核心的国家处于同等地位。【原文：France’s benchmark bond yield matched Greece’s for the first time on record, putting the bloc’s second-largest economy on an equal footing with a country once at the heart of the European sovereign debt crisis.】

item.title: 贝恩支持的 Chindata 正在洽谈创纪录的 28 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝恩资本（Bain Capital）旗下的数据中心运营商 Chindata Group Holdings Ltd. 正在与贷款方商讨一笔约 28 亿美元的潜在贷款，这将是该公司有史以来最大的一笔银行融资。【原文：Bain Capital-owned data center operator Chindata Group Holdings Ltd. is in discussions with lenders for a potential loan of around $2.8 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, in what would be its largest bank financing ever.】

item.title: 解决法律纠纷后，Uniper 上调了今年的业绩展望
item.description: 在解决了长期的法律纠纷后，Uniper SE 提高了 2024 年的盈利预测。【原文：Uniper SE increased its earnings forecast for 2024 after the German utility settled long-running legal disputes.】

item.title: 阿斯利康的恩赫图在中国被调查仍获报销
item.description: 中国批准了阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）的乳腺癌治疗药物在国家医疗保险中报销，此举将促进这家英国制药商在中国的销售，而该公司正在进行的一项调查正牵涉到公司的一些高级管理人员。【原文：China approved AstraZeneca Plc’s blockbuster breast cancer treatment for reimbursement by state-run medical insurance, a move that will boost the British drugmaker’s sales in the country in the midst of an ongoing probe that’s ensnared some of its senior executives.】

item.title: 法国预算危机令买家对进一步动荡望而却步
item.description: 在本周政治紧张局势突然爆发后，投资者纷纷避开法国资产，认为动荡时期远未结束。【原文：Investors are steering clear of French assets after a sudden flare-up in political tension this week, betting that the volatile period is far from over.】

item.title: Vision 称黑客从乌干达中央银行窃取了 1700 万美元
item.description: 据《新视野》报道，黑客入侵了乌干达中央银行的系统，从其账户中窃取了 620 亿先令（约合 1700 万美元）。【原文：Hackers breached the Ugandan central bank’s systems and stole 62 billion shillings ($17 million) from its accounts, New Vision reported.】

item.title: 欧佩克+代表称将供应问题在线会议推迟至 12 月 5 日
item.description: 据不愿透露姓名的代表称，欧佩克+将把周日的石油限产在线会议推迟到 12 月 5 日。【原文：OPEC+ will delay Sunday’s online meeting on oil production curbs to Dec. 5, according to delegates who asked not to be identified.】

item.title: 盒马鲜生首次公开募股即告上涨，创 2017 年以来南非最大首次公开募股纪录
item.description: 盒马鲜生零售有限公司（Boxer Retail Ltd.）在约翰内斯堡的首次公开募股中大涨，这是南非自 2017 年以来最大的首次公开募股。【原文：Boxer Retail Ltd. surged in its Johannesburg debut following South Africa’s biggest initial public offering since 2017.】

item.title: 东京燃气公司在埃利奥特投资后酝酿房地产方案
item.description: 日本最大的公用事业天然气供应商表示，在一名激进投资者盯上该公司的房地产后，该公司将考虑采取各种措施来释放其房地产资产的价值，包括可能出售一些没有得到有效利用的资产。【原文：Japan’s biggest utility gas provider said it will consider a variety of measures to unlock the value of its real estate assets, including potentially selling some that are not efficiently used, after an activist investor targeted the firm’s properties.】
